text: tekh terpelivykh, perenosyashchikh tyagoty i trudnosti radi Allakha, vozderzhivayushchikhsya ot grekhov, smiryayushchikhsya, terpelivykh v neschast'ye, iskrennikh v slovakh, deyaniyakh i namereniyakh, smirennykh i blagogoveynykh, raskhoduyushchikh den'gi i imushchestvo radi Allakha i prosyashchikh proshcheniya u Allakha na zare
